thread.section_title: St Paul's Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Love, Love, Love!
thread.title_full: Love, Love, Love! - Review of St Paul's Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Daisychain642
title: Love, Love, Love!
text:
Working at Olympia, I was in search of a quality hotel for a good nights rest. I phoned to make the booking the day before and asked for a quiet room.... my only request as quality sleep was much needed.
Although on a main road, the hotel is tucked away next to gardens and the room at the rear was blissfully quiet! Staff are welcoming and professional, hotel exceptionally clean and well presented. I shall definitely be back!
